item.title: Tethering on the Moto Droid with EasyTether
item.description: This is really great, and extremely easy. I have NYBill to thank for finding out about this. There is a tutorial from here, However, in case that goes away I will list the steps here (in the very likely event I forget how to connect). EasyTether is in the Android Market (as well as an EasyTether Lite, which can’t connect to https, among other things). Once you install and run the app, it can download the driver file which is a .
